text_block_list.text:
Since I had some free time, I decided to head 
to the course a little earlier than usual to 
prepare for our upcoming training session…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: S-S-Stand up! B-Bow!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Hmm, that's no good at all… 
Let me try again…!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Hyaaah!! B-B-Big brother…!?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Hyaaah!! B-B-Big sister…!?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Ah, I'm s-sorry! I was just practicing 
on my own while waiting for you…!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ah, I was practicing, umm… the class' morning greeting.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I'm on duty tomorrow, that's why… haah.
choice_data_list: You're not a fan of class duty?
You're not a fan of class duty?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: N-No, that's not quite it!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I know that I can't offer much, but if I can contribute 
even a little to the class, then I want to give it my all. 
At least, that's how I feel.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I always fill up the class journal with notes about everyone… 
and I make sure to clean the blackboard thoroughly by jumping 
up to reach all the top corners.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
But the thing is… I'm really, really bad 
at the morning greetings……

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
It's difficult for me to raise my voice… 
and when I get nervous, my voice 
sounds all weird and funny……

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Y-You're going to practice with me, big brother? 
Are you really okay with that…?!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Y-You're going to practice with me, big sister? 
Are you really okay with that…?!

We headed over to a vacant classroom to practice 
the morning greeting together.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: All right… I'll give it a shot, okay?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: S-S-Stand up! B-B-Bow! S-S-Si… ow!?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Ah, I-I'm so s-sowwy! 
I accidentally bit mysewf…!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Uugh… I messed up really badly, I'm so sorry! Even though you're going out of your way to help me…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Uugh… I messed up really badly, I'm so sorry! Even though you're going out of your way to help me…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ah, I really am so useless……

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: But… even so………
choice_data_list: You don't want to give up?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
… Yeah! That's right! 
Giving up is the last thing I want to do!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I don't have much confidence in myself…… 
but I don't want to stay like this any longer!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I'm going to try one more time. 
Please watch me, big brother!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I'm going to try one more time. 
Please watch me, big sister!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: You can do it… yeah～!!
The following day ——

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Stand up! Bow! Thank you so much 
for your help yesterday, big brother!
choice_data_list: You're doing it so well now!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Stand up! Bow! Thank you so much 
for your help yesterday, big sister!
choice_data_list: You're doing it so well now!
You're doing it so well now!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! It's amazing… when I'm with you, I feel like I have 
the strength to overcome my weaknesses, little by little.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! It's amazing… when I'm with you, I feel like I have 
the strength to overcome my weaknesses, little by little.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Ehehehe! For some reason, I feel like I can push myself 
even harder than usual in today's training ——
(… Pitter-patter…)

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Hyaaa?! Something felt wet… W-What was that?
(WOOOOOOSHHHH!)

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Whaaaaat?! B-But it was such a sunny day today…!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Aww… It must be my fault. It's because of me 
that it started raining out of the blue…!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Uuuughh, I'm so sorryyyyy!!

Despite Rice Shower's attempt to hold back her tears, they 
began to flow uncontrollably. I reached out my hands, offering 
gentle pats on her back in a desperate attempt to soothe her.
